column10: driver failed to stop as i stepped in to crosswalk on District Ave- Intersection si 4 way stop and crowded with cars and people.Difficult for drivers to know when to go. Trafic light would be clearer.

on Yates way. there is a cross walk down the street and up by the intersection but neither makes sense if you've parked your car in the deck and want to walk directly across the street.There needs to be a midblock crosswalk with flashers or a smart xwalk
Driver made a rolling stop at the stop sign and drove into a pedestrian who was in the crosswalk. Pedestrian was fine.
